name: Mole Knight
description:
You are a mole that has to defend his kingdom from other pests, but since moles don't see very well in the sunlight, you just control his movement not his shooting!

This is kind of a demo version of it, so if you like the game leave a rating or a comment and I'll add more to it :)

Controls: Arrow keys/WASD, Mouse for navigating the menu's

Playtime : a couple of minutes
